itemDescription: British army officer, politician and High Sheriff of Anglesey

wikipedia_page.main: For his son, see Sir Love Jones-Parry, 1st Baronet.Lieutenant-General Sir Love Parry Jones-Parry KH (28 November 1781 – 23 January 1853) was a British Army officer, politician and later a High Sheriff. He was the son of Thomas Jones, and after his father acquired an estate at Madryn Park from his cousin Margaret Parry in 1807 took Parry as an additional surname.
